message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it meets your needs, and I'm confident you'll be pleased with the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of the deal. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that high. I'd be willing to meet you at $1500000. Would that be a compromise you'd be willing to consider?
